topic.title: Search Engine
topic.shortdesc: WebHelp Responsive output benefit by its own search engine allowing you to browse your documents without an Internet connection for local publications.

body.p: Search engine has two main components:

dd.p: It is also known as a spider. This component is active when you publish your documentation to WebHelp and it is responsible for creating the search index. This component traverses all HTML pages (for DITA topics) to gather information.

dlentry.dd: This component is an interface between the user and the search index. It helps the user to search through the search index and displays results in the search page.
